hero.title: Generate Your
hero.description: A modern, user-friendly web application that helps developers easily create and customize their Prettier configuration files with an interactive interface.

features.title: Why Choose Our Generator?
features.subtitle: Built with modern web technologies and designed for the best developer experience

realtime.title: Real-time Generation
realtime.description: Configuration updates instantly as you select options. See your .prettierrc file generate in real-time.

interactive.title: Interactive Interface
interactive.description: Beautiful, responsive interface with dark/light theme support and comprehensive tooltips for each option.

search.title: Smart Search
search.description: Find options quickly by name, description, or related terms with our integrated search functionality.

copy.title: One-Click Copy
copy.description: Copy your generated configuration to clipboard instantly with beautiful toast notifications.

validation.title: Format Validation
validation.description: Server-side formatting ensures your Prettier configuration is always accurate and properly formatted.

design.title: Modern Design
design.description: Built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui for a beautiful, fast experience.

techStack.title: Built with Modern Technologies
techStack.subtitle: Powered by the latest web development tools and frameworks

cta.title: Ready to Generate Your Config?
cta.description: Start creating your perfect Prettier configuration in seconds. No signup required, completely free to use.

search.tryOtherTerms: Try searching for different terms or

resetDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
resetDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will clear all your selected options and reset the generator to its initial state.

ConfigAside.selectOptions: Select options to generate your Prettier config.

brand.name: Prettier Config
brand.description: Generate your .prettierrc file effortlessly with this interactive Prettier configuration tool.
